title: Our Story - ThyFlow Blog
description: With ThyFlow, you can begin to build a clientele on your schedule  The barbering industry is skyrocketing like never before. More and more, men are starting to jump into the world of self-care and for them it starts with barbering. This grooming space consists of men focusing on their needs to put their best face forward - hair, skin, and so much more.
body:
Imagine having your own personal barber when and where you

want with a tap of a finger. That is the magic we are talking about with

ThyFlow Service.

ThyFlow, Is a Web and Mobile app platform that let users easily view profiles and book

an appointment with a local, mobile, barbers. The Idea for ThyFlow, arises in the need to

find an alternative way to get a haircut at home instead of the barbershop.ThyFlow, is

the only alternative for when you cannot make it to the barbershop or new in a city and

need a barber you can trust.

The team behind ThyFlow are passionate people that really care about

haircut and the barber industry.Our team Is on a mission to make ThyFlow, the go

to place to find top-notch mobile barbers you can trust. We accomplish this by also by

having Barbershop industry processionals that handpick and verify new barbers before

joining the platform. ThyFlow Industry Proffesonals have 10+ years of owning or

operating a barbershop in their resume and they evaluate and verify new barbers. New

barbers need a license, customer service experience, pass background check, and 4

plus years of hair cutting experience to apply.

At ThyFlow, Our philosophy is your appearance is part of your

journey to confidence and success.Thru our Mobile Barber service,ThyFlow

provide customers with convenient and stress free alternative to get a great haircut at

home or wherever they may be!

Our ideal customers are the reason our team and barbers can do what they

enjoy everyday.Customer, can create an account to view the profiles of the top rated,

handpicked, mobile barbers. Thru ThyFlow web and app, You can book a haircut when

you want to ditch the barbershop for something new.

Easily choose a time and date to book an appointment with a mobile

barber.

After every haircut with a ThyFlow barber, Your confident will skyrocket

thru the roof!Our barbers, take their time to do their best work with every haircut.

ThyFlow barbers take pride in their work.ThyFlow barbers also come equipped with

state of the art professionals barber tools, that include a nice comfortable chair for you

to sit during the haircut.

If you're new in a city and willing to try an alternative way to get a haircut, ThyFlow, is the

best available option. If you live a busy life, you still need to take care of your

appearance, and having a bad hair day does not help with that. ThyFlow service comes

in handy when you have important event you have to go to and need a fresh haircut to

BOOST YOURCONFIDENT!

Our targeted customers are open-minded individuals, who are

open to trying new alternatives to get things done.Imagine how much

time you are saving having your own person barber come by with a tap of a finger. Make

the smart move by choosing ThyFlow as your go to service provider to get a haircut

when YOU want and wherever you are we will come to You.

ThyFlow, Can save you from bad hair days and from waiting in line at the

barbershop. ThyFlow service will also save you from settling for a

mediocrity haircut.

ThyFlow, will help you look your best for important event.You don't want to show up

without a fresh haircut.

ThyFlow is the way to go!

The service offer a full barbershop service at your home without CLEAN UP! Now you

can invite your friends to get a haircut at your house while you hang out with your friend

and end with a great haircut from a local mobile barber.

APP COMING SOON!

Thank you for taking this journey with us,

Welcome to ThyFlow.
